clues.text: (Judge Maria Lopez reads the clue.)  Well, I know we've all enjoyed the trial, but it looks like the jury has reached this, from the Latin for "true speech"

Your partner in crime didn't show up for court?  He may get one of these orders that will compel him to testify
Bo Schembechler(1969-1989)

Tom Osborne(1973-1997)
